form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: BOARD OF EDUCATION CITY OF CHICAGO

full_text: O. .S.20 BOARD OF EDUCATION ORIGINAL 102 CITY OF CHICAGO DIVISION OF OFFICE SERVICES 228 NORTH LASALLE STREET OLD ELEMENTARY SCHOOL CHICAGO, ILLINOIS 60601 RECORDS SECTION TELEPHONE 641-4141 TELEPHONE: 641-3818 TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN: This is to certify that the following information has been taken from pupil records of Chicago public elementary schools: PUPIL HANNAH (ANNIE) HAFT PARENTS (OR GUARDIAN) Herman - Rose & 1140 FORMER ADDRESS 2143 Washburne - 1123 S. Troy PLACE OF BIRTH Warsaw, Poland - Russia DATE OF BIRTH See "Remarks" SCHOOL YEAR OR YEAR OR DATE AGE AT ENTRY SCHOOL ATTENDED DATE ENTERED LAST SHOWN (YEARS MONTHS) Brainard Sept., 1921 5-23-1922 Shepard 25-1922 Jan., 1926 Graduated REMARKS: Date of birth shown as: December 20, 1910 for school year 1921-1922. December 29, 1909 for school years 1922-1923 thru 1925-1926. The SCHOOL YEAR begins in September and ends in June of the following year. In many cases the old records do not show the month, day and year of entering and leaving. Requests for high school records should be sent directly to the high schools attended. Further correspondence concerning this record should be addressed to the Division of Office Services and School Records Inspection. Above information mailed to: Mrs. Harriet Altman 1121 S. Atlantic Blvd. Guy D ASSISTANT Brunette TO THE I GENERAL SUPERINTENDENT Alhambra, California 91803 Taken from Depository* Records: By 566/tr Date February 22, 1972
